com.ibm.di.cli

Class RemoteServerCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.di.cli.CLIConstants
      • com.ibm.di.cli.RemoteServerCommand

  • public class RemoteServerCommand
extends CLIConstants
    Command line utility to view status/ tombstones / start / stop / reload of remote TDI server components.
